read, READ
x, IDENTIFIER
;, SEMICOLON
read, READ
y, IDENTIFIER
;, SEMICOLON
sum, IDENTIFIER
:=, ASSIGN
0, NUMBER
;, SEMICOLON
repeat, REPEAT
sum, IDENTIFIER
:=, ASSIGN
sum, IDENTIFIER
+, PLUS
x, IDENTIFIER
;, SEMICOLON
x, IDENTIFIER
:=, ASSIGN
x, IDENTIFIER
-, MINUS
1, NUMBER
;, SEMICOLON
until, UNTIL
x, IDENTIFIER
<, LESSTHAN
1, NUMBER
;, SEMICOLON
write, WRITE
sum, IDENTIFIER
;, SEMICOLON
end, END
